name: wine-qualit-dataset
data_intro: The dataset for this competition (both train and test) was generated from a deep learning model trained on the Wine Quality dataset. Feature distributions are close to, but not exactly the same, as the original. Feel free to use the original dataset as part of this competition, both to explore differences as well as to see whether incorporating the original in training improves model performance.

num_feature_intro.id: Unique identifier for each wine sample.
num_feature_intro.fixed acidity: Concentration of fixed acids in wine.
num_feature_intro.volatile acidity: Concentration of volatile acids in wine.
num_feature_intro.citric acid: Amount of citric acid in the wine.
num_feature_intro.residual sugar: Amount of sugar left after fermentation.
num_feature_intro.chlorides: Concentration of chloride in the wine.
num_feature_intro.free sulfur dioxide: Amount of free sulfur dioxide in the wine.
num_feature_intro.total sulfur dioxide: Total sulfur dioxide in the wine.
num_feature_intro.sulphates: Concentration of sulphates in the wine.
num_feature_intro.alcohol: Alcohol content percentage in the wine.
